definition: ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of iliac crest bone graft in reconstruction of alveolar bone cleft.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨应用髂骨移植在齿槽裂修复中的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To report clinical application of iliac cancellous bone grafting in alveolar cleft repair.
sentences.chinese: 目的报告自体髂骨松质骨修复牙槽突裂的临床应用。

sentences.english: Remember that sitting in and of itself "unlocks" the sacrum and the ilium.
sentences.chinese: 记住，坐式本身就会打开骶骨和髂骨之间的“锁”。

sentences.english: Part of the anterior aspect of the origin of the tensor fascia is subperiosteally stripped from the ilium .
sentences.chinese: 阔筋膜张肌起点前面的一部分从髂骨上骨膜下剥离。

sentences.english: The traditional treatment for primary malignant tumors involving the innominate bone is hemi-pelvictomy.
sentences.chinese: 髂骨原发性恶性肿瘤传统的治疗是半骨盆截除。

sentences.english: The most powerful healer is simply not to create the torque of sacrum and ilium moving apart.
sentences.chinese: 最有效地治疗就是避免引起骶骨和髂骨分离的扭动。

sentences.english: This pain can be caused by the sacrum either slipping forward or backward in relationship to the ilium.
sentences.chinese: 原因可能是骶骨相对于髂骨向前或向后脱位。

sentences.english: Conclusion Revascularized free ilium flap is effective and ideal in reconstructing forefoot defect.
sentences.chinese: 结论带血管髂骨皮瓣移植为修复前足缺损的理想方法。

sentences.english: To observe the clinical effect of Decalcification tooth matrices(DTM) in treatment of old fracture.
sentences.chinese: 观察骨又生替代髂骨植骨治疗四肢陈旧骨折的作用。

sentences.english: The entire ilium and hip joint can be reached through the iliac part of the incision.
sentences.chinese: 整个髂骨和髋关节都可以通过本切口的髂骨部分到达。

sentences.english: The entire ilium and hip joint can be reached through the iliac part of the incision.
sentences.chinese: 整个髂骨和髋关节都可以通过本切口的髂骨部分到达。

sentences.english: We describe 2 minimally invasive techniques for in-office iliac crest bone harvesting.
sentences.chinese: 我们描述2微创技术用于办公室髂骨骨收获。

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
iliac fossa (anatomy)/pelvic basin internal to ilium
